Post-it Note Camera: Create a camera that can be attached to a Post-it Note, allowing users to take photos and leave notes in the same place.
Post-it Note Scanner: Develop a device that can scan Post-it Notes and convert them into digital files, allowing users to save and organize their notes electronically.
Post-it Note Translator: Create a device that can translate text written on Post-it Notes into different languages, allowing users to communicate with people who speak different languages.
Post-it Note Printer: Develop a printer that can print Post-it Notes with text or images, allowing users to create their own custom notes.
Post-it Note Light: Create a small LED light that can be attached to a Post-it Note, allowing users to leave notes that can be seen in the dark.
